    Author:
    Orginally built by Jakob Jenkov http://tutorials.jenkov.com/java-multithreaded-servers/thread-pooled-server.html, Vinod Ananthapadmanabhan - added keep-alive behavior to server implementation Worker thread implementation class for a thread pooled web server
